articles.author: Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: Poll: Number of Americans identifying as Democrat the highest since 2012 - Axios
articles.description: 49% told Gallup they're Democrats or Democratic-leaning, compared to 40% for Republicans.
articles.content:
More American adults identify as Democrats than Republican, according to a Gallup poll published on Wednesday.

articles.author: Martha C. White
articles.title: Biden's plan to overhaul tax code would close offshore tax loopholes - NBC News
articles.description: President Joe Biden’s ambitious tax plan aims to rectify “shortcomings" and will be more fair for middle-class Americans, the president said Wednesday.
